name: Hearts and Ladders Pro
description:
Hearts and Ladders, Pro version. No ads.

Its a romantic game full of hearts, flowers, chocolates, teddies, rings, cute animals, mystery presents etc.

It can be played by moonlight or candle light, but its best played with those special people in your life. Its very easy to play, for 0 to 4 players romantic players, and is basically a loved up version of Snakes and Ladders.

Each piece can be controlled by your phone, or by a real person. So you can play by yourself, or get your friends involved, you can even let the computer control all players and just watch the action.

Download Hearts and Ladders, its Lovely.
